import './index.scss' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters'; import { useEffect, useState, useRef} from 'react' import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser' const Contact = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const refForm = useRef() useEffect(() => { (async () => { return setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) })(); }, []) const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault() emailjs.sendForm( 'gmail', 'template_ttfvwak', refForm.current, 'LHhzDmzYRfQUkYgoP', ).then( () => { alert('Message successfully sent!') window.location.reload(false) }, () => { alert('Failed to sent the message, please try again!') } ) } return ( <>

I am interested in freelance opportunities - especially on ambitious or large projects. However, if you have any other requests or questions, don't hesitate to contact me using below form either.

) } export default Contact;
